languages.text: Тьма и снег скрывали врага, солдаты вели огонь во все стороны, лишь чудом не задевая друг друга. То тут, то там боец с отчаянным воплем исчезал, утянутый неведомым противником в кипящие недра бурана.

The enemy is concealed by the snow and the darkness, forcing the soldiers to fire in all directions, by some miracle not hitting each other. First one fighter, then another, vanishes with a desperate shriek, dragged off by the unknown enemy into the roiling depths of the storm.
languages.original_text: Тьма и снег скрывали врага, солдаты вели огонь во все стороны, лишь чудом не задевая друг друга. То тут, то там боец с отчаянным воплем исчезал, утянутый неведомым противником в кипящие недра бурана.

traits.locale_text: The enemy is concealed by the snow and the darkness, forcing the soldiers to fire in all directions, by some miracle not hitting each other. First one fighter, then another, vanishes with a desperate shriek, dragged off by the unknown enemy into the roiling depths of the storm.

The enemy is concealed by the snow and the darkness, forcing the soldiers to fire in all directions, by some miracle not hitting each other. First one fighter, then another, vanishes with a desperate shriek, dragged off by the unknown enemy into the roiling depths of the storm.

The enemy is concealed by the snow and the darkness, forcing the soldiers to fire in all directions, by some miracle not hitting each other. First one fighter, then another, vanishes with a desperate shriek, dragged off by the unknown enemy into the roiling depths of the storm.

The enemy is concealed by the snow and the darkness, forcing the soldiers to fire in all directions, by some miracle not hitting each other. First one fighter, then another, vanishes with a desperate shriek, dragged off by the unknown enemy into the roiling depths of the storm.

languages.text: 敌人藏身于暴雪与黑暗之中，士兵们不得不朝四面八方随意开火，奇迹般地没有击中友军。然而，一个又一个士兵在绝望的尖叫声中消失了，被正体不明的敌人拖入了轰鸣的暴风雪深处。
languages.original_text: The enemy is concealed by the snow and the darkness, forcing the soldiers to fire in all directions, by some miracle not hitting each other. First one fighter, then another, vanishes with a desperate shriek, dragged off by the unknown enemy into the roiling depths of the storm.

traits.locale_text: 敌人藏身于暴雪与黑暗之中，士兵们不得不朝四面八方随意开火，奇迹般地没有击中友军。然而，一个又一个士兵在绝望的尖叫声中消失了，被正体不明的敌人拖入了轰鸣的暴风雪深处。

languages.text: 雪と暗闇で敵の姿が見えず、兵士は全方位を撃つしかないが、奇跡的に同士討ちは起きていない。最初にひとり、またひとりと、道の敵によって渦巻く嵐のただ中へ引きずり込まれ、絶望の悲鳴と共に姿を消す。
languages.original_text: The enemy is concealed by the snow and the darkness, forcing the soldiers to fire in all directions, by some miracle not hitting each other. First one fighter, then another, vanishes with a desperate shriek, dragged off by the unknown enemy into the roiling depths of the storm.

traits.locale_text: 雪と暗闇で敵の姿が見えず、兵士は全方位を撃つしかないが、奇跡的に同士討ちは起きていない。最初にひとり、またひとりと、道の敵によって渦巻く嵐のただ中へ引きずり込まれ、絶望の悲鳴と共に姿を消す。

languages.text: El enemigo está oculto entre la nieve y la oscuridad, lo que obliga a los soldados a disparar a bocajarro procurando no herirse entre ellos. Uno a uno, los guerreros van desapareciendo con un grito desesperado, arrastrados por el enemigo desconocido hacia las profundidades de la tormenta.
languages.original_text: The enemy is concealed by the snow and the darkness, forcing the soldiers to fire in all directions, by some miracle not hitting each other. First one fighter, then another, vanishes with a desperate shriek, dragged off by the unknown enemy into the roiling depths of the storm.

traits.locale_text: El enemigo está oculto entre la nieve y la oscuridad, lo que obliga a los soldados a disparar a bocajarro procurando no herirse entre ellos. Uno a uno, los guerreros van desapareciendo con un grito desesperado, arrastrados por el enemigo desconocido hacia las profundidades de la tormenta.

languages.text: L'ennemi étant caché par la neige et l'obscurité, les soldats en sont réduits à tirer au hasard dans toutes les directions et c'est un véritable miracle si aucun blessé n'est à déplorer. Un combattant disparaît en poussant un hurlement désespéré, traîné au cœur de la tempête par l'ennemi inconnu, puis un autre subit le même sort.
languages.original_text: The enemy is concealed by the snow and the darkness, forcing the soldiers to fire in all directions, by some miracle not hitting each other. First one fighter, then another, vanishes with a desperate shriek, dragged off by the unknown enemy into the roiling depths of the storm.

traits.locale_text: L'ennemi étant caché par la neige et l'obscurité, les soldats en sont réduits à tirer au hasard dans toutes les directions et c'est un véritable miracle si aucun blessé n'est à déplorer. Un combattant disparaît en poussant un hurlement désespéré, traîné au cœur de la tempête par l'ennemi inconnu, puis un autre subit le même sort.

languages.text: Der Feind wird von Schnee und Dunkelheit verborgen, sodass die Soldaten in alle Richtungen feuern müssen, wobei sie einander wie durch ein Wunder nicht treffen. Mit einem verzweifelten Schrei verschwindet erst ein Kämpfer, dann ein weiterer, von dem unbekannten Feind in den tobenden Sturm gezerrt.
languages.original_text: The enemy is concealed by the snow and the darkness, forcing the soldiers to fire in all directions, by some miracle not hitting each other. First one fighter, then another, vanishes with a desperate shriek, dragged off by the unknown enemy into the roiling depths of the storm.

traits.locale_text: Der Feind wird von Schnee und Dunkelheit verborgen, sodass die Soldaten in alle Richtungen feuern müssen, wobei sie einander wie durch ein Wunder nicht treffen. Mit einem verzweifelten Schrei verschwindet erst ein Kämpfer, dann ein weiterer, von dem unbekannten Feind in den tobenden Sturm gezerrt.

languages.text: Düşmanın kar ve karanlıktan görülememesi sonucu askerler, her yöne ateş etmek zorunda kaldı. Mucizevi bir şekilde birbirlerini vurmadılar. Savaşçılar sırayla bilinmeyen düşmanlarca fırtınanın derinliklerine çekilerek çaresiz bir çığlıkla ortadan kayboluyor.
languages.original_text: The enemy is concealed by the snow and the darkness, forcing the soldiers to fire in all directions, by some miracle not hitting each other. First one fighter, then another, vanishes with a desperate shriek, dragged off by the unknown enemy into the roiling depths of the storm.

traits.locale_text: Düşman kar ve karanlıkla gizlenmişti ve askerler her yöne ateş etmek zorunda kaldılar. Mucizevi bir şekilde birbirlerini vurmadılar. Önce bir savaşçı ve sonra diğeri, bilinmeyen düşman tarafından fırtınanın derinliklerine çekilerek çaresiz bir çığlıkla ortadan kayboldu.
